description: React component for test generation interface, including UI for selecting platform/framework, managing preconditions, and displaying generated test cases and code snippets.

methods.name: mockGenerate
methods.description: Creates a mock test generation result with sample test cases and code snippet.

methods.name: generate
methods.description: Handles test generation process, fetching data from backend or using mock data, and updates UI state.

methods.name: loadPreconditions
methods.description: Loads precondition text from storage if the preconditions file exists.

methods.name: savePreconditions
methods.description: Saves or overwrites precondition text to storage with specified filename.

methods.name: cancelPreconditions
methods.description: Cancels editing of preconditions, hiding the preconditions editor.
